name: SpikeJumper
description:
SpikeJumper is pretty easy game. Here you jump over spikes, bouncing on enemies. Someties die, sometimes not, trying Pto get as much points as you can.

P.S:I was late with upload on 3-5minutes or so, sorry for that. But if you still interested in playing the game, you can check it on my gamejolt account: https://gamejolt.com/games/SJ/751555 

Thanks for playing!
